sentence: The individuals subpoenaed include Michael Roman and Gary Michael Brown, who served as directors for Trump's 2020 reelection campaign.
author: FARNOUSH AMIRI
title: Jan. 6 panel subpoenas 6 more in fake GOP electors scheme

sentence: But that means Tudor Dixon, Michael Brown, Donna Brandenburg, Ralph Rebandt and Michael Markey won't be onstage with their competitors.
author: Dave Boucher
title: Detroit chamber limits field for Michigan GOP gubernatorial debate in June on Mackinac
